Andy Bianchi
General Manager
Serving since 2010
727-796-2153
Andy.Bianchi
727-796-2153
Andy.Bianchi
Contact Me
About Andy
Originally from Rome, Italy, he came to study English as a second language in 1996 in Miami, Florida. After 3 months of super-intensive courses, he attended Florida International University where he graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Hospitality Management. Andy worked for Intercontinental Hotels, Sofitel, Bentley Luxury Suites hotel in Miami Beach, Crown Golf and Invited for the last 10 years. Andy is fluent in Italian, Spanish and French and he is a certified pool operator. He is passionate about sports in general and considers his job a privilege. "You know it is not your typical 9-5 job when your office is surrounded by tennis courts, a pool, a gym and 80 children screaming and playing. Having worked in the past for big hotel chains where customers go and come daily, I really enjoy building long-lasting relationships and enriching member's lives as well as my own!"
Contact Me

Countryside Country Club
Opens in new window
3001 Countryside Blvd
Clearwater, FL 
                                33761
1 727-796-2153

Skip Image Carousel
Weddings
Events
Meetings & Corporate
Event Rooms
Tournaments & Outings
Bring Your Guests to Countryside
Whether you're a Member or not, you're welcome to host your next event with us!
Countryside Country Club is the perfect venue to host a sensational Florida event. Combining modern elegance with the natural countryside beauty of Clearwater, our clubhouse offers a myriad of beautiful event spaces for all occasions.
Contact Our Event Sales Director
Celebrate Your Dream Wedding
Congratulations on your engagement! We would be honored to help turn your wedding dreams into reality. With customizable all-inclusive wedding packages, every detail of your Countryside wedding will reflect your unique style. Whether intimate or grand, with elegant simplicity or luxurious splendor, our devoted private events team will bring your visions to life, making your wedding day a dream come true.
Explore Weddings
Schedule A Tour
Opens in new tab
View Our Wedding Brochure
Experience Excellence at Countryside
Each and every private event hosted at Countryside Country Club receives the high-quality level of service that you would expect from a private club. Offering valet, concierge and an attentive service staff, we go above and beyond to ensure that you and your guests feel welcomed and comfortable on your special day. No matter the celebration, we will ensure that it is nothing less than perfect.
Explore Events
Start Planning your Event
"There is not one single thing to say about Countryside Country Club except INCREDIBLE! They were such a pleasure to work with. We highly recommend Countryside Country Club as a first class venue for a wedding reception."
- Vicci
Set Your Sights on Success
A successful business function relies on exceptional planning, professional coordination and innovative ideas. At Countryside, our experienced staff plans and executes every event with flawless precision. Whether for a formal meeting, corporate golf outing, client-relation dinner or any other professional event, we’ll provide everything you need to inspire your team and impress your colleagues.
Explore Meetings & Corporate
Schedule a Meeting
Plan Your Next Outing
We understand that course selection and an overall great package are key to hosting a memorable event. Let Countryside assist you in planning your next tournament or golf outing.
Explore Tournaments & Outings
Schedule an Outing
"Just amazing. Great staff. Food was phenomenal! Gorgeous!"
- Bobbie

Stephanie Geshel
Pro Shop Manager

Stephanie.Geshel
Stephanie.Geshel
Contact Me
About Stephanie
Matt joins our team with over 20 years of teaching experience. He has been ranked Nationally #5 35s Team Doubles and #16 35s Individual.  Matt is a 3 time 5.0 USTA National Championship participant as well as Over 25 Mid Atlantic Singles and Doubles Championships. Prior to coming to Chantilly, Matt played on 2 Mid Atlantic Section Talbert Cup Champion Teams in 2014 and 2015. In 2003, Matt was a 4.5 National Champion in 2003.  Matt is a proud father of soccer goalie sensation, Ashley Bilger.

Countryside Country Club
Opens in new window
3001 Countryside Blvd
Clearwater, FL 
                                33761
1 727-796-2153

Skip Image Carousel Membership At Countryside Countryside is a family-friendly private club in Clearwater, Florida, known for its extensive amenities, personalized service, exceptional dining and active social calendar with many opportunities to forge lasting relationships. Welcome to your family golf retreat in Clearwater. In addition to 3 beautiful 9-hole golf courses, Countryside has developed into a highly-regarded retreat with recreation, relaxation and interaction for every member of the family. Whether it’s a round of golf, a tennis match, a dip in the pool, a great meal or dancing in the ballroom, Countryside offers countless ways to live the good life in the Clearwater area. Schedule A Tour Opens in new tab View Our Membership Brochure Membership Categories Learn More Full Golf Members gain access to the Fitness Center, Pools, Elevations Restaurant, Social Events, 13 Tennis Courts and 27 Holes of Golf! Tennis Athletic Members gain access to the Fitness Center, Pools, Elevations Restaurant, Social Events and 13 Tennis Courts! Social Athletic Members gain access to the Fitness Center, Pools, Elevations Restaurant, and Social Events! Full Golf Young Executive For members under the age of 40, with club access to the Fitness Center, Pools, Elevations Restaurant, Social Events, Tennis and 27 Holes of Golf! Cross Bay Benefits Selecting Countryside as your Home Club, members can enjoy Discounts and Access to 4 Country Clubs – Countryside, Ardea, Tampa Palms & Hunter’s Green! City Club Access - Your membership includes access to dining, events, and networking at 20 city clubs, both locally and nationwide. Check out your local area clubs to explore exclusive experiences near you. City Clubs Collection Tower Club - Ft Lauderdale, FL Centre Club - Tampa, FL Citrus Club - Orlando, FL Wherever you go, your membership goes, too. While our Club is exclusively open to Members and their guests, our Members have special access and opportunities at many other top-tier country clubs and golf courses in the Clearwater area and nationwide through our relationship to the Invited network. Wherever you go, your membership goes with you. Cross Bay & Cross Bay Premier Benefits If you're looking to enhance your membership with some exciting local club perks, this offers incredible value. With the Cross Bay benefits, you'll have the opportunity to relish golf access at discounted cart fees and enjoy reduced guest fees at not just two extra country clubs (Cross Bay) but THREE extra clubs (Cross Bay Premier) within the Tampa Bay region. Furthermore, you'll receive a 25% discount on food and beverage purchases at the additional clubs as well as your home club. Additionally, you can take advantage of special pricing for booking private events. Membership Team Matthew McCracken Membership Director Contact Me 727-350-1176 Contact Me About Matthew + Close Matthew McCracken information modal Matthew McCracken Membership Director Serving since 2022 727-350-1176 Matthew.McCracken 727-350-1176 Matthew.McCracken Contact Me About Matthew Matt brings over 15 years of sales and relationship management experience. Matt began his hospitality journey within the restaurant industry. His Iowa City restaurant was voted most romantic both years he was there. After meeting his wife Ruhee, he started a family with Mason and Maverik. Matt transitioned to banking for a leading Fortune 50. He was labeled the top finance sales producer within the consumer lending division before departing to Florida. Prior to Matt taking over the Membership Director role at Countryside, he championed the payments industry helping local neighbors save time and money. Within 3 years he was helping to facilitate over $75MM in transaction volume while monitoring over 1MM transactions annually. McCracken also finds the time to give back, donating his time and money to Wounded Warrior Project, Folds of Honor, 22 Until Valhalla and numerous groups helping our veterans, military and first responders. Contact Me Ashley Hauser Member Experience Director Contact Me 727-796-2153 Contact Me About Ashley + Close Ashley Hauser information modal Ashley Hauser Member Experience Director Serving since 2015 727-796-2153 Ashley.Hauser 727-796-2153 Ashley.Hauser Contact Me About Ashley Ashley joined the Countryside team in November 2015. Ashley was previously Countryside's Children's / Fitness Program Coordinator and is now serving as our Member Experience Director. Ashley obtained a B.A.S degree in Management and Organizational Leadership from St. Petersburg College. In her spare time, Ashley enjoys spending time with family, friends and going to Universal. Ashley enjoys planning events and is excited to create unforgettable experiences for our Members here at Countryside! Contact Me Andy Bianchi General Manager Contact Me 727-796-2153 Contact Me About Andy + Close Andy Bianchi information modal Andy Bianchi General Manager Serving since 2010 727-796-2153 Andy.Bianchi 727-796-2153 Andy.Bianchi Contact Me About Andy Originally from Rome, Italy, he came to study English as a second language in 1996 in Miami, Florida. After 3 months of super-intensive courses, he attended Florida International University where he graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Hospitality Management. Andy worked for Intercontinental Hotels, Sofitel, Bentley Luxury Suites hotel in Miami Beach, Crown Golf and Invited for the last 10 years. Andy is fluent in Italian, Spanish and French and he is a certified pool operator. He is passionate about sports in general and considers his job a privilege. "You know it is not your typical 9-5 job when your office is surrounded by tennis courts, a pool, a gym and 80 children screaming and playing. Having worked in the past for big hotel chains where customers go and come daily, I really enjoy building long-lasting relationships and enriching member's lives as well as my own!" Contact Me Get In Touch Reach out to our Membership Director today. Schedule A Tour

Host Your Clearwater Events With Us
Host a fabulous event and enjoy the fruits of your labor along with your guests. Our private event directors help with everything from food to decorations to entertainment, and our staff makes sure your event is truly memorable. No matter what the event, we'll create the appropriate mood and take the stress out of hosting. (Don't worry, you still get all the credit.)
We can help with any type of event:
Showers
Anniversary Parties
Birthday parties
Banquets & Private Dinners
School Parties
Holiday Parties
Business Meetings
Seminars
Rehearsal Dinners
Bar/Bat Mitzvah
Luncheons
Reunions

Contact Me
About Andy
Originally from Rome, Italy, he came to study English as a second language in 1996 in Miami, Florida. After 3 months of super-intensive courses, he attended Florida International University where he graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Hospitality Management. Andy worked for Intercontinental Hotels, Sofitel, Bentley Luxury Suites hotel in Miami Beach, Crown Golf and Invited for the last 10 years. Andy is fluent in Italian, Spanish and French and he is a certified pool operator. He is passionate about sports in general and considers his job a privilege. "You know it is not your typical 9-5 job when your office is surrounded by tennis courts, a pool, a gym and 80 children screaming and playing. Having worked in the past for big hotel chains where customers go and come daily, I really enjoy building long-lasting relationships and enriching member's lives as well as my own!"

About Andy
Originally from Rome, Italy, he came to study English as a second language in 1996 in Miami, Florida. After 3 months of super-intensive courses, he attended Florida International University where he graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Hospitality Management. Andy worked for Intercontinental Hotels, Sofitel, Bentley Luxury Suites hotel in Miami Beach, Crown Golf and Invited for the last 10 years. Matthew McCracken

727-350-1176
Matthew.McCracken

Matthew.McCracken
Contact Me
About Matthew
Matt brings over 15 years of sales and relationship management experience. Matt began his hospitality journey within the restaurant industry. His Iowa City restaurant was voted most romantic both years he was there. After meeting his wife Ruhee, he started a family with Mason and Maverik. Matt transitioned to banking for a leading Fortune 50. He was labeled the top finance sales producer within the consumer lending division before departing to Florida. Prior to Matt taking over the Membership Director role at Countryside, he championed the payments industry helping local neighbors save time and money. Within 3 years he was helping to facilitate over $75MM in transaction volume while monitoring over 1MM transactions annually. McCracken also finds the time to give back, donating his time and money to Wounded Warrior Project, Folds of Honor, 22 Until Valhalla and numerous groups helping our veterans, military and first responders.
